page.title: 11FREETIME AT GOLLANFIELD
page.content: In our {freetime }we make {rafts and go out on the Loch with them, sometimes we have races or play at pirates.We try to sink some of the rafts.Sometimes we dive down to see the old castle.It is great fun living at the loch. Sometimes we go{BMXING.} We have a great track just over the hills.We go for cycle runs as well.Often the girls go for rides on Mrs. Pottie's horses. They help feed them and groom them.We make huts as well.We have a few in the trees. We also go up to the shoot.At the shoot there are lots of little huts for shooting the clay pigeons.It is free.
